translation.ano_letivo.O novo ano letivo foi aberto: The academic year was created with success!

translation.ano_letivo.Ao abrir um novo ano letivo,: Creating a new academic year, it will be the one by default to the users!

translation.É o ano que irá estar selecionado automá: It is the year that will be automatically selected for the user! Only one can be selected at a time.
translation.Anos letivos disponivies para os utiliza: Academic years available for users to select.
translation.ano_letivo.Irá começar brevemente a sinc: It will start shortly the synchronization for the academic year
translation.ano_letivo.Ocorreu um problema ao tentar: There was a problem trying to start the synchronization for the academic year
translation.ano_letivo.Não consigo ativar um ano let: Can't activate an Academic year.. Why?
translation.ano_letivo.Para ativar um Ano Letivo é n: To activate an Academic Year it's necessary to first run a semester sync.
translation.ano_letivo.A sincronização vai sempre ac: The synchronization will always happen when we click the button?
translation.ano_letivo.Não. Irá ser iniciada a sincr: No. The synchronization will be initialized when the server has no work to do.
translation.ano_letivo.Todos os semestres e ano leti: And all the semesters and academic years that are active and have already been synchronized once, will be synchronized again every day at 3am.
translation.ano_letivo.Ja existem em sincronizacao,: There is already a synchronization occurring, you need to wait until its finished before start a new one.
translation.ano_letivo.Apenas 1 sincronização pode a: Only 1 synchronization can occur at a time, to prevent duplicated records or to block the server.
translation.ano_letivo.Irá sincronizar as escolas qu: It will synchronize the schools that were already fulfilled. To check the list, you can be redirect there by this

translation.O nome da unidade curricular é a segunda: The name of the curricular unit is the second (2nd) column, so we must convert to index = 1, as we always remove 1 unit from the order number of the column.
